data.name: artillery/longDescr
data.value: Artillery Strike commands artillery to lay fire on a small area for a short duration. Vehicles in the center of the impact area are heavily damaged, while the targets on the border have a high chance to escape the artillery fire.

data.value: Upon activation, commands the artillery to lay fire at the specified map area.

data.name: bomber/longDescr
data.value: Airstrike commands a ground-attack plane to take off and drop bombs along a rectangular path. Vehicles in that medium-sized area are lightly damaged and receive an additional stun effect for a certain duration.

data.name: bomber/shortDescr
data.value: Upon activation, commands a ground-attack plane to take off and drop bombs in the specified map area.

data.name: inspire/descr
data.value: Upon activation, improves the crew performance and all allies in a certain radius for a short duration.

data.name: inspire/longDescr
data.value: Inspire improves the crew performance of the vehicle and of all allies in close distance for a certain duration. When a vehicle leaves the area, the effect stays active for a few additional seconds.

data.name: inspire/name
data.value: Inspire

data.name: inspire/shortDescr
data.value: Upon activation, improves the crew performance and all allies in a certain radius for a short duration.

data.name: passive_engineering/descr
data.value: Provides a constant bonus to capture speed, capture blocking, and resupply.

data.name: passive_engineering/longDescr
data.value: Engineering provides a constant bonus to capture and resupply speed. Enemies who are damaged inside a capture circle receive an increased capture block time. In addition, capturing can be blocked by occupying the capture circle.

data.name: passive_engineering/name
data.value: Engineering

data.name: passive_engineering/shortDescr
data.value: Provides a constant bonus to capture speed, capture blocking, and resupply.

data.name: recon/descr
data.value: Upon activation, commands a reconnaissance plane to spot a line over the specified map area.

data.name: recon/longDescr
data.value: Recon Flight commands a reconnaissance plane to spot a line in a large area. Vehicles in the plane's sight are spotted and stay visible for a certain duration.

data.name: recon/name
data.value: Recon Flight

data.name: recon/shortDescr
data.value: Upon activation, commands a reconnaissance plane to spot a line over the specified map area.

data.name: smoke/descr
data.value: Upon activation, commands the artillery to lay a smoke screen at the specified map area.

data.name: smoke/longDescr
data.value: Smoke Screen fires a line of smoke grenades in a large area. Smoke blocks the line-of-sight and conceals tanks. Vehicles inside smoke have a decreased view range.

data.name: smoke/name
data.value: Smoke Screen

data.name: smoke/shortDescr
data.value: Upon activation, commands the artillery to lay a smoke screen at the specified map area.

data.name: defenderAbility/descr
data.value: Strong explosion effect pushes the ball and destroys enemies' tracks.

data.name: defenderAbility/name
data.value: Splash

data.name: lastchance/descr
data.value: Instant reloading of two rounds of the empty magazine. Cooldown: 40 s.

data.name: lastchance/name
data.value: Second Chance

data.name: aimingStabilizer/long_special
data.value: Reducing your gun dispersion is critical: the smaller the initial dispersion, the smaller the aiming circle is and the quicker you can fully aim your gun. In addition, an unprepared shot (that is fired without fully aiming or on the move) will have a better chance of hitting the target.

data.name: aimingStabilizer/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}-20%{colorTagClose} to dispersion during movement and turret rotation

data.name: aimingStabilizerBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: Improves the effect of Vertical Stabilizer (Mk 1 and Mk 2) or Stabilizing Equipment System for the course of the battle. These equipment items should be mounted on your vehicle to equip this directive.

data.name: aimingStabilizerBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Improves the effect of the stabilizer

data.name: antifragmentationLining/long_special
data.value: Spall liners absorb damage; this means they reduce the damage from ramming and High-Explosive shells. Spall liners will be beneficial to heavy tanks with reliable armor and huge ramming potential that fight mainly in close combat.

data.name: antifragmentationLining/short_special
data.value: Protects the vehicle and the crew from HE shells

data.name: autoExtinguishers/long_special
data.value: Automatically extinguishes fire and reduces the chance of the vehicle catching fire. This consumable is suitable for all vehicle types of any nation.

data.name: autoExtinguishers/short_special
data.value: Automatic fire extinguishing

data.name: camouflageBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: The Concealment skill reduces the visibility of both moving and stationary vehicles for the course of the battle. If the skill is trained to 100%, the equipped directive increases its effect; if not, the directive provides your vehicle with the skill trained to 100%.

data.name: camouflageBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Provides the Concealment skill trained to 100% or increases its effect

data.name: camouflageNet/long_special
data.value: The Camouflage Net is mainly beneficial to stealthy vehicles: small light tanks, SPGs, and Tank Destroyers with a low silhouette. It increases the effect of the Concealment skill—their combination will provide a good bonus to your vehicle. The Camouflage Net is activated when the vehicle is stationary.

data.name: camouflageNet/short_special
data.value: Reduces vehicle visibility

data.name: carbonDioxide/long_special
data.value: This type of equipment is mostly beneficial to vehicles that are prone to frequent fires due to their design features. This problem is quite common among KV series tanks, Tier X U.S.S.R. medium tanks, and a number of other vehicles.

data.name: carbonDioxide/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+50%{colorTagClose} to fuel tank durability

data.name: chocolate/long_special
data.value: Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for German vehicles.

data.name: chocolate/short_special
data.value: Improves the performance of German crews

data.name: coatedOptics/long_special
data.value: Unlike Binocular Telescope, Coated Optics provides a smaller yet permanent bonus that does not disappear with vehicle movement. As a result, Coated Optics is highly beneficial for vehicles with active gameplay—light and medium tanks.

data.name: coatedOptics/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+10%{colorTagClose} to view range

data.name: coatedOpticsBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: Improves the effect of the Coated Optics or Experimental Optics equipment for the course of the battle. These equipment items should be mounted on your vehicle to equip this directive.

data.name: coatedOpticsBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Improves the effect of the optics

data.name: cocacola/long_special
data.value: Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for U.S. vehicles.

data.name: cocacola/short_special
data.value: Improves the performance of U.S. crews

data.name: deluxAimingStabilizer/long_special
data.value: An improved version of Vertical Stabilizer ({colorTagOpen}-20%{colorTagClose} to dispersion during movement and turret rotation) that provides a stronger effect: {colorTagOpen}-25%{colorTagClose} to dispersion during movement and turret rotation. This equipment is suitable for vehicles of all nations and types; can be demounted using bonds only.

data.name: deluxAimingStabilizer/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}-25%{colorTagClose} to dispersion during movement and turret rotation

data.name: deluxCoatedOptics/long_special
data.value: An improved version of Coated Optics ({colorTagOpen}+10%{colorTagClose} to view range) that provides a stronger effect: {colorTagOpen}+12.5%{colorTagClose} to view range. This equipment is suitable for vehicles of all nations and types; can be demounted using bonds only.

data.name: deluxCoatedOptics/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+12.5%{colorTagClose} to view range

data.name: deluxEnhancedAimDrives/long_special
data.value: An improved version of Enhanced Gun Laying Drive ({colorTagOpen}+10%{colorTagClose} to aiming speed) that provides a stronger effect: {colorTagOpen}+12.5%{colorTagClose} to aiming speed. This equipment is suitable for vehicles of all nations and types; can be demounted using bonds only.

data.name: deluxEnhancedAimDrives/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+12.5%{colorTagClose} to aiming speed

data.name: deluxImprovedVentilation/long_special
data.value: An improved version of Ventilation ({colorTagOpen}+5%{colorTagClose}to all crew skills) that provides a stronger effect: {colorTagOpen}+7.5%{colorTagClose} to all crew skills. This equipment is suitable for vehicles of all nations and types; can be demounted using bonds only.

data.name: deluxImprovedVentilation/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+7.5%{colorTagClose} to all crew skills

data.name: deluxRammer/long_special
data.value: An improved version of Rammer ({colorTagOpen}-10%{colorTagClose} to loading time) that provides a stronger effect: {colorTagOpen}-12.5%{colorTagClose} to loading time. This equipment is suitable for vehicles of all nations and types; can be demounted using bonds only.

data.name: deluxRammer/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}-12.5%{colorTagClose} to loading time

data.name: deluxToolbox/long_special
data.value: An analogue of Toolbox ({colorTagOpen}+25%{colorTagClose} to repair speed) that provides a stronger effect: {colorTagOpen}+40%{colorTagClose} to repair speed. This equipment is suitable for vehicles of all nations and types; can be demounted using bonds only.

data.name: deluxToolbox/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+40%{colorTagClose} to repair speed

data.name: enhancedAimDrives/long_special
data.value: Improved aiming reduces the aiming time. A vehicle that is equipped with Enhanced Gun Laying Drive fires more accurately (in addition, it improves the fire rate, since reloading is sometimes faster than fully aiming).

data.name: enhancedAimDrives/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+10%{colorTagClose} to aiming speed

data.name: enhancedAimDrivesBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: Improves the effect of the Enhanced Gun Laying Drive or Wear-Resistant Gun Laying Drive equipment for the course of the battle. These equipment items should be mounted on your vehicle to equip this directive.

data.name: enhancedAimDrivesBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Improves the effect of gun laying drives

data.name: enhancedSuspension/long_special
data.value: There are many types of this equipment: Enhanced Torsion Bars, Enhanced Springs, and more. Increased load capacity is beneficial to vehicles with a standard configuration that require particular researched modules to be mounted, but have not yet researched the improved suspension.

data.name: enhancedSuspension/short_special
data.value: Increases vehicle's capacity load

data.name: filterCyclone/long_special
data.value: This filter is only available to U.S.S.R. vehicles. It is designated for vehicles that have relatively low engine durability. But remember, the best way to protect the engine is to hide the vulnerable parts of the hull, firing at which will certainly result in engine damage.

data.name: filterCyclone/short_special
data.value: Increases vehicle's protection

data.name: fireFightingBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: The Firefighting skill enhances the firefighting abilities of your vehicle for the course of the battle. If the skill is trained to 100%, the equipped directive increases its effect; if not, the directive provides your vehicle with the skill trained to 100%.

data.name: fireFightingBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Provides the Firefighting skill trained to 100% or increases its effect

data.name: gasoline100/long_special
data.value: Adds {colorTagOpen}5%{colorTagClose} to engine power and turret traverse speed for the course of the battle. Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for German, U.S., French, and U.K. gasoline engines.

data.name: gasoline100/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+5%{colorTagClose} to engine power

data.name: gasoline105/long_special
data.value: Adds {colorTagOpen}10%{colorTagClose} to engine power and turret traverse speed for the course of the battle. Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for German, U.S., French, and U.K. engines.

data.name: gasoline105/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+10%{colorTagClose} to engine power

data.name: grousers/long_special
data.value: A special type of equipment that is only available for particular German and U.S.S.R. vehicles. In combination with the Off-Road Driving skill trained by the Driver, this equipment provides a solid bonus to performance on swamps, sand, and snow.

data.name: grousers/short_special
data.value: Improves the vehicle performance on soft terrain

data.name: handExtinguishers/long_special
data.value: Extinguishes fire in your vehicle upon activation. Suitable for all vehicle types of any nation. The consumable is removed after a battle if it was used at least once.

data.name: handExtinguishers/short_special
data.value: Extinguishes fire

data.name: hotCoffee/long_special
data.value: Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for French vehicles.

data.name: hotCoffee/short_special
data.value: Improves the performance of French crews

data.name: improvedVentilation/long_special
data.value: Improves a number of characteristics of your vehicle: view range, fire rate, aiming time, dynamic characteristics, and more. However, the provided bonus from this equipment will only be noticeable in combination with the Brothers in Arms perk trained to 100% by your crew.

data.name: improvedVentilation/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+5%{colorTagClose} to all crew skills

data.name: improvedVentilationBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: Improves the effect of Improved Ventilation (any class) or Venting System for the course of the battle. These equipment items should be mounted on your vehicle to equip this directive.

data.name: improvedVentilationBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Improves the effect of the ventilation

data.name: largeMedkit/long_special
data.value: Treats all injured crew members upon activation. The passive effect protects the crew from injuries. This consumable is suitable for all vehicle types of any nation.

data.name: largeMedkit/short_special
data.value: Treats all injured crew members

data.name: largeRepairkit/long_special
data.value: Repairs all damaged modules at a time upon activation. The passive effect increases the repair speed. This consumable is suitable for all vehicle types of any nation.

data.name: largeRepairkit/short_special
data.value: Repairs all damaged modules

data.name: lastEffortBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: The Call for Vengeance perk gives the chance to report enemy positions for an additional 2 seconds after a vehicle's destruction for the course of the battle. If the perk is trained to 100%, the equipped directive increases its effect; if not, the directive provides your vehicle with the perk trained to 100%.

data.name: lastEffortBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Provides the Call for Vengeance perk trained to 100% or increases its effect

data.name: lendLeaseOil/long_special
data.value: Adds {colorTagOpen}5%{colorTagClose} to engine power and turret traverse speed for the course of the battle. Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for U.S.S.R. vehicles.

data.name: lendLeaseOil/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+5%{colorTagClose} to engine power

data.name: pedantBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: The Safe Stowage perk improves the durability of your ammo rack for the duration of the battle. If the perk is trained to 100%, the equipped directive increases its effect; if not, the directive provides your vehicle with the perk trained to 100%.

data.name: pedantBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Provides the Safe Stowage perk trained to 100% or increases its effect

data.name: qualityOil/long_special
data.value: Adds {colorTagOpen}5%{colorTagClose} to engine power and turret traverse speed for the course of the battle. Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for Chinese vehicles.

data.name: qualityOil/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+5%{colorTagClose} to engine power

data.name: rammer/long_special
data.value: Fire rate is one of the most important characteristics of your vehicle. This equipment is quite beneficial in a battle and should be mounted on your vehicles. However, rammers cannot be mounted on vehicles with a magazine loading system.

data.name: rammer/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}-10%{colorTagClose} to loading time

data.name: rammerBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: Improves the effect of Rammer (any gun type and caliber) or Innovative Loading System for the course of the battle. These equipment items should be mounted on your vehicle to equip this directive.

data.name: rammerBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Improves the effect of the rammer

data.name: rancorousBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: The Designated Target perk makes a target visible for an additional 2 seconds for the course of the battle. If the perk is trained to 100%, the equipped directive increases its effect; if not, the directive provides your vehicle with the perk trained to 100%.

data.name: rancorousBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Provides the Designated Target perk trained to 100% or increases its effect

data.name: ration/long_special
data.value: Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for U.S.S.R. vehicles.

data.name: ration/short_special
data.value: Improves the performance of U.S.S.R. crews

data.name: ration_china/long_special
data.value: Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for Chinese vehicles.

data.name: ration_china/short_special
data.value: Improves the performance of Chinese crews

data.name: ration_czech/long_special
data.value: Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for Czechoslovakian vehicles.

data.name: ration_czech/short_special
data.value: Improves the performance of Czechoslovakian crews

data.name: ration_italy/long_special
data.value: Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for Italian vehicles.

data.name: ration_italy/short_special
data.value: Improves the performance of Italian crews

data.name: ration_japan/long_special
data.value: Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for Japanese vehicles.

data.name: ration_japan/short_special
data.value: Improves the performance of Japanese crews

data.name: ration_poland/long_special
data.value: Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for Polish vehicles.

data.name: ration_poland/short_special
data.value: Improves the performance of Polish crews

data.name: ration_sweden/long_special
data.value: Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for Swedish vehicles.

data.name: ration_sweden/short_special
data.value: Improves the performance of Swedish crews

data.name: ration_uk/long_special
data.value: Automatically activated at the beginning of the battle and effective for the course of the battle. Only suitable for U.K. vehicles.

data.name: ration_uk/short_special
data.value: Improves the performance of British crews

data.name: removedRpmLimiter/long_special
data.value: Increases engine power by {colorTagOpen}10%{colorTagClose} but, while enabled, gradually drains engine hit points. Can be enabled or disabled in a battle multiple times. Only suitable for Chinese and U.S.S.R. vehicles.

data.name: removedRpmLimiter/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+10%{colorTagClose} to engine power but damages the engine

data.name: sixthSenseBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: The Sixth Sense perk allows you to determine whether your vehicle has been spotted by enemies for the course of the battle. If the perk is trained to 100%, the equipped directive increases its effect; if not, the directive provides your vehicle with the perk trained to 100%.

data.name: sixthSenseBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Provides the Sixth Sense perk trained to 100% or increases its effect

data.name: smallMedkit/long_special
data.value: Treats one injured crew member and removes the stun effect upon activation. Suitable for all vehicle types of any nation. The consumable is removed after a battle if it was used at least once.

data.name: smallMedkit/short_special
data.value: Treats one injured crew member and removes the stun effect

data.name: smallRepairkit/long_special
data.value: Repairs one damaged module (for example, gun or engine) or both tracks upon activation. Suitable for all vehicle types of any nation. The consumable is removed after a battle if it was used at least once.

data.name: smallRepairkit/short_special
data.value: Repairs one damaged module

data.name: smoothDrivingBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: The Smooth Ride skill improves accuracy when firing on the move for the course of one battle. If the skill is trained to 100%, the equipped directive increases its effect; if not, the directive provides your vehicle with the skill trained to 100%.

data.name: smoothDrivingBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Provides the Smooth Ride skill trained to 100% or increases its effect

data.name: smoothTurretBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: The Snap Shot skill improves accuracy during turret rotation for the course of the battle. If the skill is trained to 100%, the equipped directive increases its effect; if not, the directive provides your vehicle with the skill trained to 100%.

data.name: smoothTurretBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Provides the Snap Shot skill trained to 100% or increases its effect

data.name: stereoscope/long_special
data.value: Good view range provides a solid advantage to vehicles in battle. This type of equipment is beneficial to all vehicle types except SPGs and vehicles that engage in close combat. Binocular telescope provides a solid benefit to ambush vehicles with a low silhouette and accurate gun. The equipment is activated when the vehicle is stationary.

data.name: stereoscope/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+25%{colorTagClose} to view range for a stationary vehicle

data.name: toolbox/long_special
data.value: High repair speed is crucial for the survivability of any vehicle. An immobilized vehicle is an easy target for opponents. Mounting Toolbox is beneficial to heavy tanks, medium tanks, and tank destroyers if their crews are training the Repairs skill.

data.name: toolbox/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+25%{colorTagClose} to repair speed

data.name: toolboxBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: Improves the effect of Toolbox or Extended Spare Parts Kit for the course of one battle. These equipment items should be mounted on your vehicle to equip this directive.

data.name: toolboxBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Improves the Toolbox effect

data.name: virtuosoBattleBooster/long_special
data.value: The Clutch Braking skill increases traverse speed of both stationary and moving vehicle for the course of the battle. If the skill is trained to 100%, the equipped directive increases its effect; if not, the directive provides your vehicle with the skill trained to 100%.

data.name: virtuosoBattleBooster/short_special
data.value: Provides the Clutch Braking skill trained to 100% or increases its effect

data.name: wetCombatPack/long_special
data.value: This equipment will be useful for vehicles that often receive critical hits to their ammo racks, which can cause them to explode (for example, the IS-3, Type 59, T-44, and sometimes the T110E5 and IS-7). Other vehicles rarely have their ammo racks explode.

data.name: wetCombatPack/short_special
data.value: {colorTagOpen}+50%{colorTagClose} to ammo rack durability
